entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 11. POP 30%
entry.summary: Sunny this morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries late this morning and this afternoon. Wind northwest 30 km/h. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 27 this morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CDT Thursday 21 April 2016

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 18. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 30 km/h becoming light before morning. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 25. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CDT Thursday 21 April 2016

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 11. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries late in the morning and in the afternoon. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h in the morning. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 27. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CDT Thursday 21 April 2016
